Resume.name: Rahul Lodhi
Resume.summary_1: I have been working with web development since 1st Jan 2020 ,the period during which I have worked in differentenvironments, companies to start-ups. I am aself-motivatedand self-taught professional who likes to solve problems.
Resume.summary_2: I merge a passion for usability and user experience with technical knowledge to create cool digital experiences. My repertoire includes programming languages and tools such as ReactJS, Firebase, MongoDB ,MySQL, Apache server configuration, SASS, Twitter Bootstrap, Ant Design, Material UI.

experience.description: As the first developer to integrate the team in this greenfield project, my goal is tocreate interfaces for our new product utilizing ReactJS + CSS usingREDUX/REDUX SAGA as our state management system . The main focus is to create reusable components that could be used in future projects by the team.
workingAreas: Use my extensive experience with front end development to define the structureand components for the project, making sure they are reusable.
Keep the code quality high reviewing code from other developers and suggestingimprovements.
Interact with the designer to suggest changes and to make sure the view he hasabout the design is translated into actual functionality.
I m writtern backend code also using nodejs and Firebase.

experience.description: 15th Dec 2020, I m join The Webplant pvt. Ltd. as role of web designer, Here I developed and migrate the variours website with the help of HTML, CSS , Javascipt, jqury. I m familiar how to  libaries and Apis. And Here I do lots of work on CRM named Hubspot.
